name: Garbage Goblin
description:
Once upon a time in a fantasy world; the king and his court cut pay and health benefits to the sanitary custodians of his nation. In response, the custodians organized a union, and began a massive labor strike: leaving the citizenry no other choice but to leave their garbage, blocks, and used up magical barriers in random fields. With the ecosystem close to collapse, the kingdom has turned to the only species low enough on the fantasy world food-chain to scab for peanuts: the goblins.

Play as the titular Garbage Goblin, and push garbage bags into ground portals set up beforehand by the king's wizards to teleport the trash onto the heads of the unsuspecting laborers.
